mapper.insert: insert into orderList set order_img=#{param1}, order_product=#{param2}, order_size=#{param3}, order_qty=#{param4}, order_price=#{param5}, order_name=#{param6}
mapper.select: select order_num, order_img, order_product, order_size, order_qty, order_price, order_name from orderList where order_name=#{param1}
